name: Cedrum
description: Cedrum is a crypto wallet built with the user in mind. We’ve combined simplicity for beginners with advanced functionality for experienced users in a single solution that runs on the fast, secure, and modern Cedra blockchain. Cedrum features a clean and intuitive interface, perfect even for those just beginning their journey in the world of crypto. At the same time, we haven’t compromised on functionality: advanced features are carefully designed and seamlessly integrated for users who expect more from their wallet.

name: PFP3
description: Affordable PFP platform empowering creators with royalties and users with $1 minting.

name: Swayzy
description: Swayzy is designed to reward users for promoting brands and products on social media. By sharing content and engaging with their audience, users can earn crypto currency and NFT, creating a unique way to connect social influence with cryptocurrency. It's all about turning your digital presence into real value.

name: Cheeky Champs
description: The first NFT community for traders on Cedra. Building the unique trading experience.

name: Cedex
description: Cedex is a perpetual DEX that combines the performance of centralized exchanges with DeFi's trustless architecture through our hybrid off-chain CLOB engine with on-chain finality

name: Raters
description: Raters is a network for movie lovers to watch, rate and discuss films. Get personalized movie recommendations by connecting with users who share similar taste and discover great films immediately.

name: Walme
description: Walme brings decentralized finance, crypto cards, and Web3 banking into one secure, user-centric app. Manage your assets, pay with crypto cards, and connect through an encrypted messenger with AI insights-all in one platform.

name: BTC BOX
description: BTC BOX is the first physical crypto tracker designed as a sleek, branded giveaway. Unlike typical event merchandise, it’s practical, engaging, and memorable — letting users follow live Bitcoin prices on a stylish, pocket-sized device.

name: Cedrascan
description: Explore transactions, accounts, events, nodes, gas fees and other network activity within the Cedra Network.

name: FarmTrust
description: FarmTrust is a transparent and lightweight eco-labelling platform designed for agricultural products, built in accordance with ISO 14021 and ISO 14024 standards. The system enables producers to declare or certify the environmental attributes of their crops and record them securely on a blockchain, ensuring traceability, authenticity, and consumer confidence.

name: Alyra
description: Alyra is the execution layer for on-chain apps. One API for seamless swaps & bridging across EVM, Solana and Cedra

name: PeelSwap
description: PeelSwap is decentralized exchange (DEX) that combines Automated Market Maker and Automated Market Taker abilities

name: PeelSwap
description: PeelSwap is decentralized exchange (DEX) that combines Automated Market Maker and Automated Market Taker abilities
